channel.title: TOP on RFP-iOS-SDK Docs
channel.description: Recent content in TOP on RFP-iOS-SDK Docs

item.title: Introduction
item.description:
Acquiring the Media Id Initialization within the code This guide summarizes SDK usage. For the detailed API specification, see the comments in each header file within the framework.
Acquisition of Media Id Register from the management screen to issue the Media Id. (At the current stage, inquiries should be made to the representative) This Media ID uses the app identification, so be sure not to forget this.

item.title: Acquisition of advertising framework Id
item.description: Currently, you should contact our representative regarding advertisement framework registration settings. The advertisement framework ID is issued from the management screen. When the following information is set, the advertisement framework ID is output. Advertisement framework name Advertisement image size Advertisement format(necessary only for simple In-Feed advertisements described later) Number of advertisement cases Advertisement position array HTML, width, height (necessary only when selecting the format to depict on WebView)

item.title: Simple infeed advertising
item.description:
Simple In-Feed advertisement display Acquiring events when displaying simple In-Feed advertisements Additional loading of simple In-Feed advertisements Simple In-Feed advertisement format Points to note when using simple In-Feed advertisements A precondition for simple In-Feedadvertisements is use of UITableView. For other uses, use Customized In-Feed advertisements.
Displaying simple In-Feed advertisements The necessary files for displaying In-Feed advertisements are as follows. RFPInstreamAdLoader.h The abovementioned files are used in the following implementations to load In-Feed advertisements.

item.title: Customized infeed advertising
item.description: Loading customized In-Feed advertisements Displaying customized In-Feed advertisements Notifying impressions of customized In-Feed advertisements Transition processing when clicking customized In-Feed advertisements Acquiring display characters for customized In-Feed advertisement button Loading customized In-Feed advertisements and acquiring events at the time of each notification Customized In-Feed advertisement parameters Arbitrary use of advertisement formats provided as default by SDK Acquiring exceptions occurring within SDK When you want to display with more flexibility than with simple In-Feed advertisements, you can use customized In-Feed advertisement functions.

item.title: Support for video advertising
item.description: â€» Currently video advertisements can only be used by limited partners Components provided in the video advertising SDK Video advertisement judgment Used with video advertising Delegate method Acquiring video advertisements Playback preparation complete Playing videos Setting the cache Components provided with the video advertisement SDK RFPPlayerControl: this is the UI view displaying the video player. This provides a function to control the video. Insert any UIView as a Subview.
